## Data description

```{r}
dt <- data.frame(Name = c("Bob", "Emmy", "Mark", "Ann", "Tom", "Sam"),
                 Height = c(1.72, 1.80, 1.94, 1.60, 1.90, 1.84))

mean(dt$Height)
```

The average height in the sample is `r mean(dt$Height)` meters.
